about_text:
I am a web developer driven by curiosity and armed with a degree in natural sciences and a master in cognitive sciences.
Equipped with expertise in PHP, JavaScript, mySQL, HTML, CSS, and frameworks, I build strong and dynamic web applications.
I excel at solving intricate problems and creating user-friendly solutions.
My thirst for knowledge and fascination with modern technologies keeps me ahead in the ever-changing digital world.
